A Server for Real-Time Event Tracking in News Ralf D.

INTRODUCTION a0a2a1a4a3a6a5a8a7a10a9a8a11a12a11a12a13a14a11a16a15a18a17a20a19a21a15a22a11a24a23a26a25a28a27a29a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a32a31a33a11a16a19a21a3a6a17a20a19a12a34a35a7a36a1a37a3a38a11a40a39a24a23a26a11a16a41a40a42a12a17a30a3a4a43a44a7a33a31a36a11a45a25a28a7a33a1 a7a36a46a45a7a47a23a48a25a28a11a16a23a26a7a49a19a8a7a33a31a33a7a33a1a38a1a38a27a16a23a26a50a51a3a38a11a14a7a33a52a12a3a6a23a26a27a29a31a33a3a54a53a6a34a8a1a38a3a37a3a6a5a8a7a49a55a44a11a24a23a26a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a56a11a24a15a57a3a6a5a8a7a49a9a35a11a16a41 a41a54a5a21a17a30a31a58a5a32a17a30a1a40a11a24a15a59a17a20a19a21a3a38a7a47a23a26a7a33a1a38a3a48a3a38a11a60a7a33a27a45a31a38a5a51a34a8a1a38a7a47a23a16a61a48a62a63a5a8a7a48a62a64a11a24a55a21a17a30a31a28a65a37a7a33a3a38a7a36a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a56a27a16a19a35a13 a62a18a23a26a27a29a31a58a66a12a17a20a19a8a39a56a67a22a62a10a65a2a62a2a68a69a55a21a23a26a11a24a53a70a7a33a31a33a3a60a71a73a72a29a42a4a74a21a42a64a75a76a42a57a77a33a78a79a27a45a13a21a13a80a23a26a7a36a1a38a1a38a7a33a13a56a27a24a19a8a13a81a31a36a11a24a19a21a3a6a17a20a19a21a82 a34a8a7a33a1a40a3a38a11a60a27a45a13a21a13a12a23a26a7a33a1a38a1a49a3a6a5a21a17a30a1a37a19a8a7a33a7a33a13a44a42a18a43a76a34a8a3a10a5a8a27a45a1a37a43a83a7a33a7a47a19a56a11a16a15a4a19a8a7a33a31a33a7a33a1a38a1a6a17a30a3a84a50a85a27a16a55a76a55a21a86a20a17a30a7a33a13 a17a20a19a87a27a88a43a8a27a45a3a38a31a38a5a76a82a22a55a21a23a26a11a12a31a33a7a33a1a38a1a6a17a20a19a8a39a89a31a33a11a24a19a21a3a38a7a36a52a12a3a49a11a16a19a89a27a90a1a38a3a38a27a45a3a6a17a30a31a60a31a33a11a24a86a20a86a30a7a36a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a91a61a32a92a81a5a8a27a45a3 a17a30a1a37a23a26a7a36a93a45a34a76a17a20a23a26a7a33a13a89a15a22a11a16a23a40a3a38a11a16a55a76a17a30a31a60a13a21a7a33a3a38a7a33a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a56a27a24a19a8a13a85a3a6a23a26a27a29a31a58a66a12a17a20a19a8a39a51a3a38a11a88a43a83a7a28a11a24a15a59a34a35a3a6a17a20a86a20a17a30a3a84a50 a3a38a11a90a7a47a19a8a13a80a82a22a34a8a1a38a7a47a23a26a1a37a17a30a1a40a27a88a23a26a7a33a27a16a86a20a82a84a3a6a17a30a25a28a7a28a1a38a50a12a1a38a3a38a7a33a25a94a41a54a5a21a17a30a31a58a5a95a11a24a55a83a7a47a23a26a27a45a3a38a7a33a1a48a11a24a19a32a27a60a86a20a17a30a46a45a7 a1a38a3a6a23a26a7a36a27a45a25a96a11a24a15a54a17a20a19a21a15a22a11a16a23a26a25a28a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a18a61a51a62a54a5a21a17a30a1a97a55a8a27a24a55a83a7a47a23a28a13a21a7a33a1a38a31a47a23a38a17a20a43a83a7a33a1a28a3a6a5a8a7a28a7a33a52a12a3a38a7a47a19a8a1a6a17a30a11a24a19 a27a16a19a35a13a90a25a28a11a12a13a12a17a20a98a35a31a33a27a29a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a56a11a16a15a64a27a49a43a8a27a45a3a38a31a38a5a21a82a6a11a16a23a38a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a38a7a33a13a32a3a6a23a26a27a45a31a38a66a12a17a20a19a35a39a60a1a38a50a12a1a38a3a38a7a33a25a99a17a20a19a21a3a38a11a100a27 a23a26a7a36a27a24a86a20a82a84a3a6a17a30a25a28a7a32a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a100a15a22a11a24a23a60a7a36a46a45a7a47a19a21a3a60a13a21a7a33a3a38a7a33a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a18a42a79a7a33a46a29a7a47a19a21a3a28a3a6a23a26a27a29a31a58a66a12a17a20a19a8a39a76a42a2a13a76a11a12a31a26a34a76a82 a25a100a7a47a19a21a3a79a1a6a34a35a25a28a25a100a27a24a23a38a17a30a101a33a27a29a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a91a42a18a27a16a19a35a13a51a3a6a23a26a27a16a19a35a1a6a86a30a27a29a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a91a61 2.

a62a64a11a56a27a24a86a20a86a30a11a16a41a96a1a6a5a8a27a24a23a38a17a20a19a8a39a102a11a24a15a28a23a26a7a33a1a38a11a16a34a76a23a26a31a36a7a33a1a51a1a6a34a35a31a38a5a103a27a45a1a51a3a6a5a8a7a85a31a33a11a16a86a20a86a30a7a33a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a99a11a16a15 a19a8a7a33a41a79a1a59a1a38a3a38a11a24a23a38a17a30a7a33a1a4a43a83a7a33a3a6a41a54a7a36a7a47a19a60a25a40a34a76a86a30a3a6a17a20a55a21a86a30a7a37a34a35a1a38a7a26a23a26a1a33a42a76a27a40a31a26a86a20a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a6a82a84a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a63a27a24a23a26a31a38a5a76a17a30a3a38a7a33a31a26a82 a3a6a34a21a23a26a7a10a17a30a1a54a34a8a1a38a7a33a13a44a61a4a104a8a11a24a23a79a27a29a13a76a13a21a7a33a13a88a9a8a7a33a52a45a17a20a43a21a17a20a86a20a17a105a3a84a50a45a42a35a19a8a11a45a3a54a27a16a86a20a86a18a15a105a34a21a19a35a31a36a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a8a27a24a86a20a17a30a3a6a50a14a19a8a7a33a7a33a13 a43a83a7a88a17a30a25a49a55a21a86a30a7a33a25a28a7a47a19a21a3a38a7a36a13a81a17a20a19a102a3a6a5a8a7a60a31a33a7a47a19a21a3a6a23a26a27a16a86a37a1a38a7a26a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a16a106a59a17a20a19a107a27a29a13a76a13a12a17a30a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a108a3a38a11a14a34a8a1a38a7a47a23a38a82   a1a38a7a26a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a79a27a16a19a35a13a60a27a16a34a35a3a6a5a8a7a47a19a21a3a6a17a30a31a33a27a29a3a38a7a40a3a6a5a35a7a33a25a100a1a38a7a47a86a30a46a45a7a33a1a54a17a20a19a90a3a6a5a8a7a10a1a38a27a29a25a28a7a37a25a100a27a24a19a21a19a35a7a47a23a63a27a45a1a59a27 a34a8a1a38a7a47a23a69a41a54a11a24a34a21a86a30a13a112a42a35a43a21a34a8a3a10a3a6a5a8a7a47a19a32a1a38a7a47a19a8a13a51a27a45a13a21a13a12a17a30a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a8a27a24a86a57a31a33a11a45a25a28a25a100a27a24a19a8a13a76a1a2a3a38a11a49a17a30a13a76a7a26a19a21a3a6a17a20a15a22a50 a3a6a5a8a7a33a25a28a1a38a7a26a86a30a46a45a7a33a1a51a27a29a1a88a1a38a7a26a23a26a46a45a17a30a31a33a7a85a55a21a23a26a11a24a46a45a17a30a13a21a7a47a23a26a1a51a27a16a19a35a13a113a41a63a5a21a17a30a31a38a5a108a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a17a30a31a33a7a45a67a22a1a26a68a14a3a6a5a8a7a33a50 a55a21a23a26a11a16a46a45a17a30a13a76a7a29a61a113a114a115a3a40a17a30a1a28a27a24a86a30a1a38a11a85a55a83a11a45a1a38a1a6a17a20a43a21a86a30a7a116a15a22a11a16a23a28a27a51a1a38a7a26a23a26a46a45a17a30a31a33a7a47a82a22a55a76a23a26a11a16a46a45a17a30a13a21a7a47a23a51a31a26a86a20a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a60a3a38a11 a27a29a31a33a3a54a27a29a1a54a27a24a19a90a17a20a19a21a3a38a7a47a23a38a15a22a27a45a31a36a7a40a3a38a11a49a27a40a19a35a7a36a41a10a1a57a1a38a11a24a34a21a23a26a31a33a7a40a1a6a34a35a31a38a5a51a27a29a1a54a27a48a25a28a11a12a13a76a7a36a25a49a82a22a43a35a27a29a1a38a7a33a13 a19a8a7a33a41a79a1a38a41a54a17a20a23a26a7a85a1a38a7a26a23a26a46a45a17a30a31a33a7a45a42a2a7a33a52a12a3a6a23a26a27a45a31a33a3a6a17a20a19a8a39a107a1a38a3a38a11a16a23a38a17a30a7a33a1a88a15a117a23a26a11a45a25a118a3a6a5a8a7a14a19a35a7a33a41a79a1a90a1a38a11a24a34a21a23a26a31a33a7 a27a16a19a35a13a103a27a45a13a21a13a80a17a20a19a8a39a119a3a6a5a8a7a33a25a120a3a38a11a113a27a102a1a6a55a44a7a33a31a47a17a20a98a8a7a33a13a121a31a33a11a16a86a20a86a30a7a33a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a122a11a16a19a121a3a6a5a35a7a95a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a16a61 a110a45a34a8a31a58a5a95a7a33a52a12a3a38a7a47a23a38a19a8a27a24a86a91a17a20a19a21a3a38a7a47a23a38a15a22a27a45a31a36a7a49a55a76a23a26a11a29a39a24a23a26a27a29a25a28a1a37a41a54a17a20a86a20a86a64a86a20a17a20a66a12a7a26a86a30a50a116a43a44a7a48a3a6a5a8a7a97a55a21a23a38a17a30a25a28a27a24a23a26a50 a1a38a11a16a34a76a23a26a31a36a7a49a11a16a15a4a86a20a17a30a46a29a7a28a13a76a27a29a3a38a27a76a106a44a3a6a5a8a7a49a31a26a34a76a23a38a23a26a7a47a19a21a3a79a55a76a23a26a11a29a3a38a11a45a3a84a50a45a55a44a7a28a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a37a43a21a50a60a17a30a3a38a1a38a7a47a86a20a15a54a17a30a1 a11a16a19a76a86a30a50a95a31a33a27a24a55a8a27a24a43a21a86a30a7a51a11a24a15a54a23a26a7a36a3a6a23a38a17a30a7a33a46a45a17a20a19a35a39a95a1a6a55a44a7a33a31a47a17a20a98a8a7a33a13a107a41a57a7a47a43a89a55a8a27a45a39a45a7a36a1a33a42a4a7a26a17a30a3a6a5a35a7a47a23a123a11a24a19a8a31a33a7 a11a16a19a51a13a21a7a33a25a28a27a16a19a35a13a32a11a24a23a2a27a45a3a54a23a26a7a33a39a16a34a76a86a30a27a16a23a37a17a20a19a21a3a38a7a47a23a26a46a16a27a16a86a30a1a33a61 a104a35a11a16a23a91a27a10a25a40a34a21a86a30a3a6a17a20a86a20a17a20a19a35a39a16a34a44a27a24a86a44a31a36a11a24a19a21a3a38a7a33a52a12a3a91a41a63a17a30a3a6a5a40a5a21a17a30a39a24a5a21a82a84a46a45a11a16a86a20a34a35a25a28a7a79a19a35a7a36a41a10a1a91a1a38a3a6a23a26a7a33a27a45a25a100a1a33a42 a11a16a19a35a7a37a19a8a7a33a7a33a13a21a1a54a25a28a11a16a23a26a7a37a3a6a5a8a27a24a19a111a1a6a17a30a25a49a55a76a86a30a7a48a27a24a86a30a7a26a23a26a3a6a17a20a19a35a39a28a124a100a3a6a5a35a7a2a1a38a50a12a1a38a3a38a7a33a25a99a25a40a34a35a1a38a3a57a27a24a86a30a1a38a11 a3a6a23a26a27a16a19a35a1a6a86a30a27a29a3a38a7a51a1a38a3a38a11a24a23a38a17a30a7a33a1a60a41a54a5a21a17a30a31a58a5a125a27a24a23a26a7a28a19a35a11a29a3a49a17a20a19a102a3a6a5a8a7a88a34a8a1a38a7a47a23a16a126a1a49a86a30a27a24a19a8a39a24a34a8a27a45a39a29a7a85a27a16a19a35a13 a39a29a7a47a19a8a7a47a23a26a27a45a3a38a7a32a1a6a34a35a25a100a25a28a27a24a23a38a17a30a7a33a1a51a11a16a15a28a1a38a7a36a3a38a1a88a11a16a15a49a23a26a7a26a86a30a7a33a46a16a27a24a19a21a3a51a1a38a3a38a11a24a23a38a17a30a7a36a1a33a61a122a110a127a17a20a19a8a31a33a7a89a3a6a5a8a7 a86a30a27a16a19a35a39a16a34a35a27a29a39a45a7a45a67a22a1a26a68a51a11a24a15a48a3a6a5a8a7a51a19a35a7a33a41a79a1a90a1a38a3a6a23a26a7a33a27a45a25a28a1a90a3a6a5a35a27a29a3a60a41a63a17a20a86a20a86a48a43a44a7a14a34a8a1a38a7a33a13a102a17a30a1a88a19a8a11a45a3 a98a8a52a12a7a33a13a85a43a83a7a47a15a22a11a24a23a26a7a26a82a115a5a8a27a24a19a8a13a44a42a4a3a6a23a26a27a16a19a35a1a6a86a30a27a29a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a113a27a24a19a8a13a89a1a6a34a8a25a28a25a28a27a16a23a38a17a30a101a33a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a102a27a24a23a26a7a48a5a35a27a16a19a76a82. a13a12a86a30a7a33a13a119a43a21a50a108a7a33a52a12a3a38a7a47a23a38a19a8a27a24a86a48a55a76a23a26a11a12a31a33a7a36a1a38a1a38a7a33a1a33a61a128a62a54a5a8a7a89a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a32a31a33a27a24a19a103a86a30a11a45a27a45a13a103a27a24a19a8a13a35a129a16a11a24a23 a7a33a1a38a3a38a27a16a43a76a86a20a17a30a1a6a5a102a19a8a7a33a3a6a41a57a11a24a23a38a66a56a31a33a11a16a19a76a19a8a7a33a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a35a1a60a3a38a11a32a11a24a19a8a7a14a11a16a23a28a25a28a11a16a23a26a7a88a17a20a19a8a1a38a3a38a27a24a19a8a31a33a7a33a1a60a11a24a15 a11a24a34a21a23a79a25a40a34a76a86a30a3a6a17a20a82a84a7a47a19a8a39a24a17a20a19a8a7a48a25a28a27a45a31a38a5a76a17a20a19a8a7a40a3a6a23a26a27a24a19a8a1a6a86a30a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a51a1a38a50a12a1a38a3a38a7a33a25a90a130a40a71a20a131a12a42a12a132a24a78a44a27a16a19a35a13a60a41a54a17a20a86a20a86 a17a20a19a21a46a45a11a16a66a12a7a90a3a6a5a35a7a28a55a21a23a26a11a24a55a44a7a47a23a100a17a20a19a35a1a38a3a38a27a16a19a35a31a33a7a90a41a54a5a35a7a47a19a87a27a51a31a47a86a20a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a49a23a26a7a33a93a45a34a8a7a33a1a38a3a38a1a48a27a51a3a6a23a26a27a24a19a8a1a6a82 a86a30a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a102a15a105a23a26a11a45a25a133a11a24a19a8a7a88a86a30a27a16a19a35a39a16a34a35a27a29a39a45a7a51a17a20a19a21a3a38a11a89a27a24a19a8a11a45a3a6a5a8a7a47a23a16a61a113a110a45a17a30a25a49a17a20a86a30a27a24a23a38a86a117a50a45a42a2a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a17a30a31a33a7a47a82 a55a21a23a26a11a24a46a45a17a30a13a21a7a47a23a32a31a47a86a20a17a30a7a26a19a21a3a38a1a116a55a21a23a26a11a16a46a45a17a30a13a76a7a89a1a6a34a8a25a28a25a28a27a16a23a38a17a30a101a33a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a122a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a17a30a31a33a7a33a1a14a15a22a11a16a23a90a1a6a55a44a7a33a31a47a17a20a82 a98a8a7a33a13a89a86a30a27a24a19a8a39a24a34a8a27a45a39a45a7a36a1a33a42a79a41a63a17a30a3a6a5a113a3a6a5a8a7a60a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a100a23a26a11a24a34a8a3a6a17a20a19a35a39a89a3a6a5a8a7a14a1a6a34a8a25a28a25a28a27a16a23a38a17a30a101a33a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19 a23a26a7a33a93a45a34a8a7a33a1a38a3a37a3a38a11a60a3a6a5a8a7a49a27a16a55a76a55a21a23a26a11a24a55a21a23a38a17a30a27a45a3a38a7a60a1a6a34a8a25a28a25a28a27a16a23a38a17a30a101a33a7a47a23a28a67a22a11a16a23a40a27a60a46a45a7a26a23a26a50a88a23a38a34a8a13a80a17a30a25a28a7a26a19a76a82  a3a6a23a26a27a16a19a35a1a6a86a30a27a29a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a108a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a26a1a60a67a22a1a38a11a45a25a28a7a90a11a24a19a56a3a6a5a8a7a60a1a38a27a45a25a28a7a90a31a33a11a45a25a49a55a21a34a8a3a38a7a47a23a16a42a59a1a38a11a45a25a28a7a60a23a26a7a47a82 a25a100a11a45a3a38a7a16a68a47a42a29a27a45a1a91a41a54a7a47a86a20a86a21a27a45a1a91a27a37a41a54a7a26a43a48a31a47a23a26a27a16a41a63a86a30a7a26a23a64a27a24a19a8a13a40a19a35a7a33a41a79a1a38a41a54a17a20a23a26a7a4a23a26a7a33a3a6a23a38a17a30a7a36a46a24a27a16a86a35a7a26a19a35a39a16a17a20a19a35a7 a15a162a11a24a23a48a27a45a13a21a13a12a17a20a19a35a39a51a19a35a7a36a41a10a1a40a1a38a3a38a11a16a23a38a17a30a7a33a1a48a3a38a11a14a3a6a5a8a7a28a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a7a26a23a16a61a28a158a14a34a21a86a30a3a6a17a20a55a76a86a30a7a14a34a8a1a38a7a47a23a26a1a33a42a64a7a33a27a29a31a58a5 a41a54a17a30a3a6a5a111a27a49a1a38a7a47a55a8a27a24a23a26a27a29a3a38a7a37a31a47a86a20a17a30a7a26a19a21a3a10a55a21a23a26a11a45a39a24a23a26a27a29a25a14a42a21a27a45a31a33a31a36a7a33a1a38a1a79a3a6a5a35a7a2a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a63a1a6a17a30a25a97a34a21a86a30a3a38a27a24a19a8a7a47a82 a11a16a34a35a1a6a86a30a50a29a61 3.
IMPLEMENTATION a62a54a5a8a7a85a98a76a23a26a1a38a3a51a5a12a34a21a23a26a13a80a86a30a7a56a17a20a19a163a17a30a25a48a55a76a86a30a7a33a25a100a7a47a19a21a3a6a17a20a19a35a39a103a3a6a5a35a7a56a62a79a65a37a62a96a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a89a41a57a27a45a1 a3a38a11a32a31a47a23a26a7a33a27a29a3a38a7a60a27a116a23a26a7a33a27a16a86a20a82a84a3a6a17a30a25a28a7a14a46a29a7a47a23a26a1a6a17a30a11a24a19a125a11a24a15a2a3a6a5a35a7a90a3a38a11a24a55a21a17a30a31a14a3a6a23a26a27a29a31a58a66a12a17a20a19a8a39a89a1a38a50a12a1a38a3a38a7a33a25a14a61 a62a54a5a8a7a116a55a21a23a26a7a47a82a84a7a33a52a45a17a30a1a38a3a6a17a20a19a8a39a107a1a38a50a12a1a38a3a38a7a33a25a118a5a8a27a45a13a107a43a44a7a33a7a26a19a119a43a8a27a45a3a38a31a38a5a76a82a84a11a16a23a38a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a38a7a33a13a102a43a44a7a33a31a33a27a16a34a35a1a38a7 a3a6a5a8a7a40a13a21a7a47a98a76a19a21a17a30a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a87a11a24a15a59a3a6a5a8a7a40a62a10a65a2a62a119a3a6a23a26a27a29a31a58a66a12a17a20a19a8a39a60a3a38a27a45a1a6a66a90a23a26a7a33a93a45a34a76a17a20a23a26a7a36a1a37a7a33a27a29a31a58a5a32a7a33a46a29a7a47a19a21a3 a3a38a11a60a43a44a7a28a55a76a23a26a11a12a31a36a7a33a1a38a1a38a7a33a13a89a27a29a1a40a3a6a5a35a11a16a34a35a39a16a5a89a17a30a3a49a41a57a7a47a23a26a7a28a3a6a5a8a7a28a11a24a19a21a86a30a50a85a7a36a46a45a7a47a19a21a3a33a42a64a39a29a7a47a19a8a7a47a23a26a27a45a3a6a82 a152a54a7a36a31a33a27a24a34a8a1a38a7a51a3a6a5a35a7a60a23a26a7a33a25a28a11a16a46a16a27a24a86a2a11a24a15a69a13a76a11a12a31a26a34a35a25a28a7a26a19a21a3a38a1a88a15a105a23a26a11a29a25a128a3a6a5a8a7a88a17a20a19a21a82a6a25a100a7a33a25a28a11a24a23a26a50 a19a8a11a45a3a6a17a20a98a8a31a33a27a29a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a108a25a28a7a33a1a38a1a38a27a29a39a45a7a16a68a47a61a111a0a10a3a48a3a6a5a21a17a30a1a28a3a6a17a30a25a28a7a45a42a59a3a6a5a8a7a123a55a83a7a47a23a26a25a28a27a24a19a8a7a47a19a21a3a49a23a26a7a26a55a44a11a45a1a6a82 a167a10a19a8a31a33a7a14a3a6a5a8a7a14a17a20a19a8a31a47a23a26a7a33a25a28a7a47a19a21a3a38a27a16a86a48a46a45a7a47a23a26a1a6a17a30a11a16a19a108a11a24a15a69a3a6a5a35a7a51a3a6a23a26a27a29a31a58a66a127a7a47a23a90a41a54a27a45a1a60a11a24a55a83a7a47a23a26a27a24a82 a3a38a11a12a31a36a11a24a86a40a15a22a11a16a23a51a3a6a5a8a7a85a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a51a34a8a1a38a7a33a1a88a55a21a86a30a27a24a17a20a19a21a82a84a3a38a7a33a52a12a3a85a31a36a11a45a25a28a25a28a27a16a19a35a13a21a1a32a27a24a19a8a13a107a23a26a7a33a1a6a34a76a86a30a3 a31a36a11a12a13a76a7a33a1a100a3a38a11a14a15a22a27a45a31a47a17a20a86a20a17a30a3a38a27a29a3a38a7a14a13a21a7a47a43a21a34a35a39a29a39a24a17a20a19a8a39a87a124a32a11a16a19a35a7a60a31a33a27a16a19a56a1a6a17a30a25a49a55a21a86a30a50a121a154a6a3a38a7a47a86a20a19a8a7a33a3a38a155a32a3a38a11 a3a6a5a8a7a54a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a59a27a24a19a8a13a48a1a38a3a38a27a24a23a26a3a18a7a26a19a21a3a38a7a47a23a38a17a20a19a35a39a40a31a36a11a45a25a28a25a28a27a16a19a35a13a21a1a79a67a22a27a10a1a6a17a30a25a48a55a76a86a30a7a2a31a33a11a45a25a28a25a100a27a24a19a8a13a80a82 a86a20a17a20a19a8a7a14a31a26a86a20a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a28a41a54a5a76a17a30a31a38a5a89a55a21a23a26a11a45a25a49a55a8a3a38a1a40a15a22a11a24a23a100a27a14a31a33a11a29a25a28a25a28a27a16a19a35a13a44a126a1a48a27a24a23a26a39a16a34a35a25a100a7a47a19a21a3a38a1a49a41a57a27a45a1 a27a16a86a30a1a38a11a28a41a54a23a38a17a30a3a38a3a38a7a47a19a83a68a47a61a59a159a54a11a45a25a28a25a28a27a16a19a35a13a21a1a54a3a38a11a48a3a6a5a35a7a79a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a54a17a20a19a8a31a47a86a20a34a8a13a76a7a40a34a35a1a38a7a26a23a54a27a16a34a35a3a6a5a8a7a47a19a21a82  a23a26a7a36a25a28a11a16a46a45a17a20a19a35a39a28a13a21a11a12a31a47a34a8a25a28a7a47a19a21a3a38a1a54a15a105a23a26a11a29a25a163a27a40a31a36a11a24a86a20a86a30a7a33a31a33a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a18a42a44a25a100a27a24a19a8a27a45a39a45a7a36a25a28a7a47a19a21a3a79a11a24a15a91a25a40a34a76a86a20a82  a11a16a15a40a13a21a11a12a31a47a34a8a25a28a7a47a19a21a3a38a1a88a43a21a50a95a13a76a27a29a3a38a7a16a129a24a3a6a17a30a25a28a7a32a11a24a23a100a43a44a11a12a11a24a86a30a7a33a27a16a19a135a93a45a34a8a7a47a23a26a50a45a42a57a3a6a23a26a27a24a19a8a1a6a86a30a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a18a42 a1a6a34a8a25a28a25a28a27a16a23a38a17a30a101a33a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a18a42a44a15a22a7a33a3a38a31a38a5a21a17a20a19a35a39a60a11a24a15a109a41a54a7a47a43a90a55a35a27a29a39a45a7a33a1a33a42a8a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a2a1a38a3a38a27a29a3a6a17a30a1a38a3a6a17a30a31a33a1a33a42a18a27a16a19a35a13 a23a26a7a36a39a24a17a30a1a38a3a6a23a26a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a108a27a45a1a60a27a32a3a6a23a26a27a45a31a38a66a12a7a47a23a16a42a57a1a6a34a35a25a28a25a100a27a24a23a38a17a30a101a33a7a47a23a16a42a54a19a8a7a33a41a54a82a84a7a33a46a45a7a26a19a21a3a28a13a76a7a36a3a38a7a33a31a33a3a38a11a24a23a16a42 a11a16a23a2a31a47a86a20a34a35a1a38a3a38a7a26a23a38a17a20a19a35a39a90a7a47a19a35a39a16a17a20a19a35a7a29a61 a62a54a5a8a7a97a98a21a19a35a27a16a86a54a1a38a3a38a7a26a55a89a17a20a19a85a55a21a23a26a11a12a13a12a34a35a31a47a17a20a19a8a39a32a3a6a5a35a7a49a15a117a34a76a86a20a86a57a1a38a50a12a1a38a3a38a7a33a25a134a17a30a1a48a3a6a5a35a7a48a17a30a25a49a55a76a86a30a7a26a82 a25a100a7a47a19a21a3a38a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a102a27a24a19a8a13a85a17a20a19a21a3a38a7a33a39a16a23a26a27a45a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a102a11a24a15a2a46a16a27a24a23a38a17a30a11a16a34a35a1a60a31a47a86a20a17a30a7a26a19a21a3a38a1a33a42a54a41a54a5a76a17a30a31a38a5a56a17a30a1a49a31a26a34a76a23a38a82 a23a26a7a26a19a21a3a6a86a30a50a97a17a20a19a28a55a21a23a26a11a45a39a16a23a26a7a33a1a38a1a33a61a64a0a113a1a6a34a35a25a28a25a100a27a24a23a38a17a30a101a33a7a47a23a59a15a22a11a16a23a64a156a64a19a35a39a16a86a20a17a30a1a6a5a18a42a83a110a127a55a8a27a24a19a21a17a30a1a6a5a18a42a21a158a51a27a16a19a76a82 a13a21a27a24a23a38a17a20a19a91a42a12a27a16a19a35a13a48a168a45a27a16a55a35a27a16a19a35a7a33a1a38a7a59a5a35a27a29a1a112a43a44a7a33a7a26a19a28a27a29a13a76a27a16a55a35a3a38a7a33a13a40a17a20a19a21a3a38a11a37a27a57a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a45a17a30a31a33a7a47a82a22a55a21a23a26a11a24a46a45a17a30a13a21a7a47a23 a31a26a86a20a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a4a15a22a11a16a23a64a3a6a5a8a7a10a62a79a65a2a62a56a110a80a7a26a23a26a46a45a7a47a23a16a42a12a27a29a1a18a5a35a27a29a1a4a27a2a13a76a11a12a31a26a34a35a25a28a7a26a19a21a3a6a82a6a31a26a86a20a34a35a1a38a3a38a7a47a23a38a17a20a19a8a39a49a55a21a23a26a11a24a82 a39a16a23a26a27a45a25a14a61a59a0a56a34a35a1a38a7a47a23a38a82a22a17a20a19a21a3a38a7a47a23a38a15a162a27a45a31a33a7a40a31a47a86a20a17a30a7a26a19a21a3a4a17a30a1a4a19a8a7a33a27a24a23a57a31a33a11a45a25a48a55a76a86a30a7a33a3a6a17a30a11a16a19a18a42a44a27a16a19a35a13a100a27a37a19a35a7a33a41a54a82 a7a36a46a45a7a47a19a21a3a54a13a21a7a33a3a38a7a33a31a36a3a6a17a30a11a24a19a51a31a26a86a20a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a10a17a30a1a4a55a21a86a30a27a24a19a21a19a8a7a33a13a112a61a57a62a54a5a35a7a2a31a33a7a47a19a21a3a6a23a26a27a24a86a91a1a38a7a47a23a26a46a29a7a47a23a54a17a30a1a54a41a54a23a38a17a30a3a6a82 a3a38a7a26a19a51a17a20a19a56a159a79a169a40a169a49a42a35a27a16a19a35a13a51a3a6a5a8a7a48a46a24a27a16a23a38a17a30a11a24a34a8a1a49a31a26a86a20a17a30a7a47a19a21a3a38a1a40a27a24a23a26a7a40a17a30a25a49a55a21a86a30a7a33a25a28a7a47a19a21a3a38a7a33a13a32a17a20a19a56a159a37a42 a159a79a169a40a169a49a42a21a27a24a19a8a13a32a168a45a27a16a46a16a27a76a61 4.

a71a30a72a47a78a97a168a76a61a35a0a79a86a20a86a30a27a24a19a91a42a91a168a76a61a35a157a49a61a8a159a54a27a24a23a38a43a83a11a24a19a8a7a47a86a20a86a22a42a64a157a49a61a8a65a37a11a12a13a21a13a80a17a20a19a8a39a45a3a38a11a16a19a18a42a109a168a76a61a21a170a4a27a29a25a49a23a26a11a24a19a91a42 a71a74a24a78a48a168a76a61a8a159a54a27a24a23a38a43a83a11a24a19a8a7a47a86a20a86a22a42a18a170a48a61a21a170a4a27a16a19a35a39a21a42a44a168a76a61a21a235a18a27a16a166a44a7a47a23a26a3a6a50a29a42a44a172a97a61a21a65a48a61a152a4a23a26a11a16a41a54a19a91a42 a71a75a24a78a40a170a48a61a35a170a59a27a24a19a8a39a76a42a8a168a76a61a8a159a54a27a24a23a38a43a44a11a16a19a35a7a47a86a20a86a22a42a91a172a40a61a35a65a48a61a35a152a4a23a26a11a16a41a54a19a18a42a8a62a40a61a76a171a64a17a30a7a47a23a26a31a33a7a29a42a35a152a37a61a8a62a97a61 a0a79a23a26a31a58a5a21a17a20a43a8a27a24a86a30a13a44a42a18a27a16a19a35a13a51a236a48a61a76a235a44a17a20a34a18a61a8a235a18a7a33a27a16a23a38a19a76a17a20a19a8a39a14a0a79a55a76a55a21a23a26a11a45a27a29a31a58a5a8a7a33a1a79a15a22a11a24a23
